senses.sense_definition: The top academic student in a school or a specific year.

examples.text: She studied incredibly hard all year to become the <w>dux</w> of her graduating class.
The principal presented a gold medal to the <w>dux</w> of the school during the ceremony.

traits.comment: chiefly Scotland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa

senses.sense_definition: A high-ranking commander in the Roman army responsible for more than one legion.

examples.text: The emperor appointed a new <w>dux</w> to defend the northern border against invaders.
In the late empire, a <w>dux</w> held significant military power over a specific province.
The composer introduces the <w>dux</w> in the first measure before the answering voice enters.
Students must learn to distinguish the <w>dux</w> from the comes when analyzing the piece.
